projects.title: My Website
projects.description: The source code to this very website!

projects.title: Discord Bots
projects.description: A collection of Discord bot(s) built using the Discord API.

projects.title: Lineup Generator
projects.description: Commandline application that generates a properly positioned lineup for a co-ed kickball/softball league.

projects.title: IMDB Movie Database
projects.description: Project allows for the normalization and visualization of data from the IMDB Public Dataset.

projects.title: AlgoViz
projects.description: iOS application that allows for step-by-step visualizations of various sorting algorithms.

projects.title: TransactionTrackr
projects.description: Project that tracks and visualizes transactions over time to help users manage their finances.

projects.title: DBMS
projects.description: Project that creates a Database Management System (DBMS) from the ground up.

projects.title: ESS Simulation
projects.description: Program that models and analyzes evolutionary stable strategies (ESS) within the context of game theory.

projects.title: Route Finding
projects.description: Program that finds the shortest path between cities using DFS, BFS, and A* search algorithms.

projects.title: Secure Messaging
projects.description: This project uses public key encryption to send secure messages to other users over a distributed system.

projects.title: Prime Number Gen
projects.description: Generates large prime numbers using parallel processing.

projects.title: Disk Usage
projects.description: Analyzes disk space usage by performing both sequential and parallel searches.

projects.title: My Shell
projects.description: Creates a bash shell that is able to interact with a personal computer via Linux commands.

projects.title: Family Tree
projects.description: This program builds an N-ary tree where each node stores details about individuals and their descendants.

projects.title: Ahnentafel
projects.description: This program allows for conversion of ahnentafel numbers between binary, base-10, as well as a written depiction of the number.

projects.title: Party Chat
projects.description: A chatroom application where users exchange messages over TCP connections.

projects.title: Place Tiles
projects.description: Based on r/place, this application allows users to collaboratively place tiles on a grid.

projects.title: Microwave
projects.description: A simulator for a microwave oven, utilizing a microcontroller and hardware to replicate microwave functionality.
